game module¶

This module runs both the bomberman game and the machine learning modules.

Project : Bomberman Bot with Machine Learning Olin College Software Design Final Orject, Spring 2017 This module is originally written by Rickyc (Github user) Team AFK added machine learning Features to the original module.
